descriptions:
Bring the charm of wildlife right into your backyard with our beautifully crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box! Designed with both style and function in mind, this cozy abode offers local squirrels a safe and inviting place to call home.

Crafted with the highest quality cedar wood, renowned for its natural resistance to the elements and durability, this nesting box is perfect for outdoor use. The robust construction features both glued and nailed joints, ensuring a sturdy and long-lasting haven for your furry friends.

But it's not just about practicality; this nesting box is a work of art. Adorning one of its walls is a stunning, burned image of a squirrel, masterfully created by the talented artist Drew Senesac. This unique touch not only adds to the aesthetic appeal of the box but also celebrates the creature it's designed to protect.

The thoughtfully designed squirrel house measures 12x11x10 inches on the outside, providing ample space, while the inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches offer a cozy and secure nesting area. The 3.5-inch squirrel opening is perfectly sized to welcome squirrels yet deter larger, unwelcome guests.

Maintenance is a breeze with the removable roof, allowing for easy cleaning and ensuring the health and happiness of its inhabitants. Plus, installation couldn't be simpler, thanks to the included mounting hardware—two screws and washers—and pre-drilled holes. In no time at all, you can have the nesting box securely attached to a tree or post in your backyard.

Invite nature to your doorstep and give a squirrel a place to thrive. Our Squirrel House/Nesting Box isn't just a purchase; it's an investment in the natural world, a touch of rustic charm for your garden, and a delightful spectacle as you watch squirrels frolic and play in their new home.

Order now and become a steward of wildlife while adding a picturesque piece to your outdoor space!

Introducing our charming Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box – the perfect addition to your outdoor sanctuary that provides a cozy and safe haven for your neighborhood squirrels!

Crafted with durability in mind, this nesting box is constructed from premium cedar wood, a material renowned for its natural resistance to the elements and its delightful aromatic scent. Both glued and nailed to ensure a sturdy and long-lasting home for your furry friends, this squirrel house is built to withstand the tests of time and weather.

One of the most enchanting features of this nesting box is the exquisite burned image of a squirrel, meticulously created by the talented artist Drew Senesac. This rustic artwork adds a whimsical touch to your garden or backyard, turning the nesting box into not only a functional habitat but also a piece of outdoor art.

Ease of maintenance is at the forefront of the design. The roof of the squirrel house is conveniently removable, making cleaning a breeze and ensuring a healthy environment for its occupants. Hanging and mounting this box is simple, too, with two pre-drilled holes, screws, and washers included, allowing for a secure and stable installation on a tree, fence, or wall.

The outside dimensions of the box are 12x11x10 inches, providing ample space for squirrels to nest and rest. Inside, the dimensions are a snug 5.75x9 inches, creating a cozy retreat. The 3.5-inch squirrel opening is perfectly sized to welcome squirrels while keeping larger predators out.

Whether you're an animal lover, a nature enthusiast, or simply looking to add charm to your outdoor space, our Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box is the ideal choice. Give the squirrels in your area a home they'll love, and enjoy the added benefit of watching these playful creatures in your own backyard.

Order now and be a part of fostering wildlife, one nesting box at a time!

🌲 Introducing Our Charming Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box! 🐿️

Are you looking for a delightful and durable addition to your backyard that will provide a cozy home for your furry friends? Look no further! Our Squirrel House/Nesting Box is a perfect choice for nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts.

Crafted with care from naturally weather-resistant cedar wood, this nesting box is not only sturdy – being both glued and nailed – but also a beautiful outdoor feature. Its rustic charm is enhanced by a unique burned image of a squirrel, skillfully created by the talented artist Drew Senesac, making each house a one-of-a-kind piece.

Key Features:
- **Durable Cedar Wood Construction**: Resists the elements and ensures longevity.
- **Outdoor Ready**: Designed to withstand the natural outdoor environment.
- **Artisan Touch**: A beautifully etched squirrel image adds to its natural appeal.
- **Easy Maintenance**: Removable roof for convenient cleaning and seasonal check-ups.
- **Simple Installation**: Comes with pre-drilled holes, two screws, and washers for secure mounting.
- **Spacious Interior**: Inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches offer ample space for nesting.
- **Perfectly Sized Entrance**: A 3.5-inch opening welcomes squirrels but deters larger unwanted guests.
- **Generous Size**: Outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches make it a prominent and inviting structure.

This nesting box is not just a home for squirrels; it's a piece of art that enhances the beauty of your garden or backyard space. The removable roof makes cleaning a breeze, and the included mounting hardware ensures you can easily secure the box to a tree, fence, or wall.

Invite the delightful chitter of squirrels to your outdoor space with this enchanting Squirrel House/Nesting Box. It's an investment in the beauty of your property and the wellbeing of local wildlife. Order yours today and enjoy the lively presence of squirrels in your own backyard! 🌳💕🐿️

🌲 **Welcome Nature Lovers: Introducing Our Artisan Squirrel House/Nesting Box!** 🌲

Are you ready to invite some whimsical wildlife into your garden? Look no further than our carefully crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box, a beautiful and functional addition to your outdoor space!

**Crafted from Cedar Wood:** The timeless charm of cedar not only offers a durable sanctuary for your furry friends but also emits a fresh, forest-like scent. Cedar's natural resistance to the elements makes this nesting box perfect for outdoor use.

**Sturdy Construction:** Each house is both glued and nailed, ensuring a secure and lasting home for squirrels. You can rest easy knowing that this nest will stand strong through the seasons.

**Artistic Flair:** Adorning one wall of the nesting box is a captivating image of a squirrel, skillfully burned into the wood by artist Drew Senesac. This unique touch adds an air of rustic elegance to your garden decor.

**Convenience is Key:** With a removable roof, cleaning and maintenance are a breeze. Plus, the box comes ready to hang with pre-drilled holes, including two screws and washers for a stable mount.

**Perfectly Sized:** Measuring 12x11x10 inches on the outside, the nesting box provides ample space while maintaining a cozy interior of 5.75x9 inches, complete with a squirrel-friendly 3.5-inch opening. It's like a luxury hotel for your bushy-tailed guests!

**Easy Installation:** You'll have everything you need to get started right away. Our squirrel house comes with all the necessary mounting hardware, ensuring a quick and hassle-free setup.

Invite nature closer to home and enjoy the playful antics of squirrels with our lovingly made Squirrel House/Nesting Box. It's not just a purchase; it's an investment in creating a lively and joyous backyard ecosystem. 🍃

**Order yours today and watch as your garden becomes a hub of squirrel activity!**

🌲🐿️ Introducing Our Charming Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box – A Cozy Retreat for Your Furry Friends! 🐿️🌲

Give your neighborhood squirrels a place to call home with this beautifully crafted cedar wood squirrel house/nesting box. Designed with both durability and aesthetics in mind, it's the perfect addition to any outdoor space.

🎨 Unique Artistic Touch: Each box features an exquisitely burned image of a squirrel, created by the talented artist Drew Senesac, making it not just a nesting spot but also a piece of art for your garden.

🛠️ Sturdy and Weather-Resistant: Constructed with care, each house is glued and nailed to ensure it stands up to the elements. Cedar wood is naturally resistant to rot and insects, making it the ideal material for your outdoor wildlife sanctuary.

🧼 Easy to Clean: With a removable roof, keeping the nesting box in tip-top condition is a breeze. This thoughtful feature ensures that you can easily access the interior for cleaning and maintenance.

🔩 Hassle-Free Installation: Your squirrel house comes with all the necessary hardware – two screws and washers – for quick and secure mounting. Get ready to enjoy furry visitors in no time!

📏 Perfectly Sized: With outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches, it's spacious enough to be inviting, yet cozy enough for squirrels to feel safe. The interior space is 5.75x9 inches, offering ample room for nesting. A 3.5-inch opening allows easy access for squirrels but keeps larger unwanted guests out.

Transform your garden into a wildlife haven with this enchanting cedar wood squirrel house/nesting box. Order now and delight in watching your new squirrel neighbors frolic and play! 🌳🐿️✨

🌲 **Welcome Nature Lovers! Introducing Our Charming Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box!** 🐿️

Are you a wildlife enthusiast looking for the perfect addition to your garden? Look no further! Our beautifully crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box is not only a safe haven for your furry friends but also an exquisite piece of art that will enhance the natural beauty of your outdoor space.

**Key Features:**

🔸 **Superior Craftsmanship:** Constructed from the finest cedar wood, known for its durability and natural resistance to the elements, our squirrel house is both glued and nailed, ensuring a sturdy and long-lasting abode for your bushy-tailed buddies.

🔸 **Aesthetically Pleasing:** Admire the intricate, burned image of a playful squirrel on the wall of the box, masterfully created by the talented artist Drew Senesac. This unique feature adds a rustic charm and is sure to attract both squirrels and compliments from your guests.

🔸 **Easy Maintenance:** With a removable roof, cleaning and refilling the nesting box becomes a breeze, ensuring a hygienic environment for the squirrels to thrive in.

🔸 **Convenient Installation:** We've included two screws and washers for mounting, making it easy to secure your squirrel house to a tree, fence, or post. Plus, with pre-drilled holes, you'll have it up and ready in no time!

🔸 **Perfectly Sized:** With outside dimensions measuring 12x11x10 inches, it's spacious enough for squirrels to move in comfortably. The inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches and a squirrel opening of 3.5 inches ensure easy access for the squirrels while keeping predators out.

🌳 Create a wildlife sanctuary in your own backyard and enjoy the delightful sight of squirrels frolicking and nesting right before your eyes. Our Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box is not just a product; it's an invitation to connect with nature and bring life to your garden.

**Order yours today and be the reason the squirrels have a place to call home!** 🏡
